thread.title: Swansea face action from Premier League over big-screen replays of Jack Butland's challenge on Andre Ayew
thread.title_full: Swansea face action from Premier League over big-screen replays of Jack Butland's challenge on Andre Ayew

title: Swansea face action from Premier League over big-screen replays of Jack Butland's challenge on Andre Ayew
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 16:40 CET Swansea face action from Premier League over big-screen replays of Jack Butland's challenge on Andre Ayew - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew hurdles over Stoke goalkeeper Jack Butland whose poorly timed challenge was shown repeatedly 
The Premier League are investigating Swansea for showing replays of Jack Butland's poorly-timed tackle on Andre Ayew on Monday night on their big screen. 
During Stoke's 1-0 away win, Butland played a ball straight to Ayew in the 17th minute before going in studs first trying to retrieve it, forcing the Swansea player to jump out of the way. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
